targets.expr: round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{response_code=~"(1|2|3).*", response_flags="-", destination_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="destination", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace, response_code, response_flags), 0.001) > 0

panels.title: Succeeding Requests by Source And Response Code

targets.expr: round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{response_code!~"(1|2|3).*", destination_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="destination", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace, response_code, response_flags), 0.001) > 0

round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{response_code="1.*", response_flags!="-", destination_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="destination", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace, response_code, response_flags), 0.001) > 0

panels.title: Failing Requests by Source And Response Code
Average Request Duration by metrics group ($istio_metrics_group)
Requests by Response Code and Flags

targets.expr: round(sum(rate(istio_requests_total{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace",source_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="source", response_code!~"(4|5).*", response_flags="-", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (destination_service, response_flags, response_code), 0.001) > 0

panels.title: Succeeding Outgoing Requests by Destination And Response Code

targets.expr: round(sum(rate(istio_requests_total{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace",source_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="source", response_code=~"(4|5).*", response_flags="-", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (destination_service, response_flags, response_code), 0.001) > 0

round(sum(rate(istio_tcp_connections_opened_total{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace",source_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="source", response_flags!="-", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (destination_service, response_flags, response_code), 0.001) > 0

round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace",source_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="source", response_flags!="-", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (destination_service, response_flags, response_code), 0.001) > 0

panels.title: Failing Outgoing Requests by Destination And Response Code

targets.expr: (histogram_quantile($percentile/100, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace",source_workload=~"$workload",reporter="source",response_code!="101", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (destination_service, le)) / 1000) or histogram_quantile($percentile/100, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace",source_workload=~"$workload",reporter="source",response_code!="101", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (destination_service, le))

sum(irate(istio_tcp_connections_opened_total{response_flags="-", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace",source_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="source", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (destination_service) / sum(irate(istio_tcp_connections_opened_total{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace",source_workload=~"$workload", namespace="$namespace", reporter="source", destination_service!~".*15020",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__rate_interval])) by (destination_service)

panels.title: Outgoing Success Rate (non-5xx responses) By Destination

list.label: Istio metrics group
list.name: istio_metrics_group
list.query: response code : response_code,response flags : response_flags,request method : request_method,request host : request_host, source workload : source_workload
